name: Space Mafia or something
description:
Controls:

WASD to move.

Space/click to advance dialogue.

Made for the 1st Miz Game Jam in far less time than I should've used.

All sound effects an music from opengameart:

https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure

https://opengameart.org/content/background-space-track

https://opengameart.org/content/boom-pack-1

(the zip below contains the source, though the game's ending is scuffed)
